title: Drama Queen

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose two players at night. They will become Rivals with each other. Their win condition is updated to include that they must survive to the end of the game and eliminate their rival to win.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players who are Rivals will no longer be able to target each other with abilities.
- Anyone who you have previously targeted cannot target you with attacking abilities. If they attempt to do so, their ability will fail.
- You have a one-use Basic autovest.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure that one player from at least three pairs of rivals you have created dies.

desc:
